data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Limo/Black Car Service (Scheduled by Time). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Execute advanced payment path (split tender and/or tip/gift/credit entitlement usage) and persist allocation evidence.
data.expectedResult: Payment trace clearly links payer, tender mix, and booking/order amounts with no ambiguity.
